attributes.action: Enable the people viewing e-petitoins to be against as well as for any given petition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The e-petition system is a good idea and on the whole i aprove, however i noticed that there are many petitions which i would activly campaign against should they ever become an issue.  Its nice that we can voice our support for these things, but it would also be nice if we could voice our opposistion

rejection.details: This issue is covered in the FAQs: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/faq
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
